## Description {#details}

Dithering mass distributer.

This class splits up a single mass into portions by weight, dithering to spread out error. No mass is lost. The dithering precision depends on the precision of the product of <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bfi-detail/blockmass">BlockMass</a></em> and <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a></em>.

The distribution algorithm follows.


<ul>
<li>Initialize by saving the sum of the weights in <em>RemWeight</em> and the mass to distribute in <em>RemMass</em>.</li>
<li>For each portion:
<ul>
<li>Construct a branch probability, P, as the portion&#39;s weight divided by the current value of <em>RemWeight</em>.</li>
<li>Calculate the portion&#39;s mass as <em>RemMass</em> times P.</li>
<li>Update <em>RemWeight</em> and <em>RemMass</em> at each portion by subtracting the current portion&#39;s weight and mass.</li>
</ul></li>
</ul>

Definition at line 116 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl.cpp</a>.
